Bad weather emergency, only today 60 interventions by the Fire Brigade
60 interventions only during the day, but from midnight to still more than 100
04 Nov 2019, 19:57 by Redazione



The Firefighters of Avellino, today 4 November, have continued for the whole day to work to face the calls of help for the strong bad weather that has hit our province. In the end, about sixty interventions will be counted, mainly due to flooding, water infiltration, small landslides, recovery of bogged-down vehicles, and the fall of branches and trees, often including large trees, due to the strong wind. The area most affected, always the Celsi district of Forino, where assistance was given to people who had to leave home, in need of medical care.

Among the many interventions, a particular one carried out at the Lauro post office, where a package containing suspicious material was found. The nucleus N. B. C. R. (nuclear-bacteriological-chemical-radiative) intervened on the site and recovered the suspect casing and handed it over to the Carabinieri for the ritual checks. The Grottaminarda detachment team intervened on the A16 Napoli - Canosa motorway, at Km. 51 in the direction of Naples, in the municipality of Manocalzati, due to a road accident involving two cars, without major consequences for the occupants.
In the afternoon, instead, we had to intervene in Taurano to search for a missing person, a 60 year old, research that continues today. The operations room of the Via Zigarelli Command continues to receive reports of interventions, and work is still ongoing to bring them to an end.
